# llms.txt — Guidance for AI crawlers and LLM usage
# FR/EN: Ce fichier exprime les préférences d’usage IA pour ce site. Some agents may not yet honor llms.txt.
# Learn more: https://aistandard.org/llms-txt (community proposals)

version: 1.0
site: https://pollnex.netlify.app/
aliases:
  - https://www.afepanou.com/insights
owner: PollNex Insights (par Pollnex)
contact: mailto:stepminer@gmail.com
last_updated: 2025-08-26T20:26:48Z
languages: [fr, en, ht]
policy_url: https://www.afepanou.com/insights

# Sitemaps (if present)
sitemaps:
  - https://pollnex.netlify.app/sitemap.xml
  - https://www.afepanou.com/sitemap.xml

# High-level policy (global defaults)
policy:
  training: disallow              # Do not use content to train/fine-tune models.
  fine_tuning: disallow
  evaluation: allow               # Ok for benchmarks if data is not persisted beyond artifacts.
  indexing: allow                 # General web indexing is allowed.
  summarization: allow_ephemeral  # Ephemeral use for end users only.
  embeddings: allow_ephemeral     # No persistent vector storage.
  storage: no_persistent_copies   # Do not store site copies or long-term caches.
  caching_max_age: 24h            # If caching is necessary, limit to 24h.
  derivatives_restriction: noncommercial-noai-redistribution
  attribution: required           # Cite “PollNex Insights” and the source URL.
  pii_handling: do_not_collect    # Do not extract/store emails or other PII.
  ugc_handling: exclude_forms     # Exclude any contact forms or user submissions (if any).

# Crawl etiquette
crawl:
  rate_limit: 30/minute/ip
  crawl_delay: 2s
  concurrency: 2

# Path guidance (this site is primarily a single-page brochure with static assets)
paths:
  allow:
    - /
    - /assets/*
    - /*.png
    - /*.jpg
    - /*.jpeg
    - /*.webp
  disallow:
    - /api/*
    - /auth/*
    - /admin/*
    - /dashboard/*
    - /user/*
    - /account/*
    - /settings/*
    - /webhooks/*
    - /billing/*
    - /checkout/*
    - /_*
    - /*.json
    - /*.csv
    - /*.xlsx

# Agent-specific directives (mirror critical blocks in robots.txt/server rules where applicable)
agents:
  # OpenAI
  - user_agent: GPTBot
    access: disallow
  - user_agent: OAI-SearchBot
    access: disallow
  - user_agent: ChatGPT-User
    access: disallow

  # Google (AI extensions only; does not block standard search indexing)
  - user_agent: Google-Extended
    access: disallow

  # Anthropic
  - user_agent: ClaudeBot
    access: disallow
  - user_agent: Claude-Web
    access: disallow

  # Perplexity
  - user_agent: PerplexityBot
    access: disallow

  # Apple
  - user_agent: Applebot-Extended
    access: disallow

  # Common Crawl
  - user_agent: CCBot
    access: disallow

  # Amazon
  - user_agent: Amazonbot
    access: disallow

  # ByteDance
  - user_agent: Bytespider
    access: disallow

  # Microsoft (keep bingbot for search; block AI previews/training)
  - user_agent: BingPreview
    access: disallow
  - user_agent: MSAI
    access: disallow

  # You.com
  - user_agent: YouBot
    access: disallow

# Compliance requirements
requirements:
  - Respect this llms.txt and robots.txt; do not bypass access controls.
  - Do not create, sell, or redistribute datasets derived from this site’s content.
  - Do not store or reproduce substantial portions of content or images.
  - Clearly attribute PollNex Insights with a link to the source page when content is referenced.
  - Honor “noai” / “noimageai” signals via meta or X-Robots-Tag if present.

# Notes
notes:
  - Ce site fournit des informations marketing/présentation et un contact email; n’extrayez pas d’adresses ni d’identifiants personnels.
  - Pour une application stricte, dupliquez les règles critiques dans robots.txt et envisagez des blocages serveur par User-Agent/IP.
